pageProduct.name: Pentavite Multivitamin + Iron Kids 60 Chewable Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pentavite Multivitamin + Iron Kids Chewables is a premium formulation to support healthy growth and development in children.

This great tasting formula comes contains 18 nutrients and comes in a natural apple & blackcurrant flavour. 
  • No artificial sweeteners 
  • No artificial colours or flavours  
  • No added dairy 
  • No added gluten 
  • Vegetarian friendly 
Dedicated to Children's Health

Suitable For: Vegetarian friendly, 2 - 12 years old.

Product Claims: Supports healthy growth and development

Boxed Contents: 60 Chewable tablets

Size: 60 Tablets

Dermatologist Tested?: n/a

Dermatologically Tested?: n/a

Soap-Free?: n/a

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Supports healthy growth and development
• Maintains energy levels
• Supports nutritional intake
• Supports general health and wellbeing
• Supports healthy cognitive function
• Supports healthy immune system function

Warnings

Vitamins and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet. Do not use if seal under cap is broken or missing.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Supports general health and wellbeing.

Ingredients

Vitamin A (from retinol palmitate 137.5 microgram) 75 microgram RE; Vitamin B1 (as thiamine from thiamine nitrate 375 microgram) 304 microgram; Vitamin B2 (as riboflavin from riboflavin sodium phosphate 476 microgram) 375 microgram; Vitamin B3 (as nicotinamide) 4.5mg; Vitamin B5 (as pantothenic acid from calcium pantothenate 2.87mg) 2.63mg; Vitamin B6 (as pyridoxine from pyridoxine hydrochloride 375 microgram) 308 microgram; Vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin) 0.68 microgram; Vitamin C (as ascorbic acid from calcium ascorbate dihydrate 32.7mg) 27mg; Vitamin D (Cholecalciferol) 2.5 microgram (100IU); VItamin K2 (menaquinone 7) 6.25 microgram; Eicifin 7.5 microgram; Iodine (from potassium iodide 20 microgram) 15 microgram; Iron (from ferrous fumarate 6.9mg) 2.25mg; Magnesium (from magnesium phosphate tibasic 46.86mg) 12.65mg; Zinc (from zinc citrate dihydrate 3.11mg) 1mg; Lysine (from lysine hydrochloride 62.48mg) 50mg.

Directions

Chew. Do not swallow whole. Take with food.

STORAGE AND DISPOSAL

Store below 25°C.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
